title: Self-Managed SaaS Deployment for Covalent Cloud
description: Deploying Covalent Cloud as a self-managed SaaS solution is the simplest way to get Covalent up and running with a remote server without dealing with any cloud infrastructure or additional setup steps. To start using Covalent Cloud, all you need to do is install the open-source Covalent and Covalent Cloud packages via pip, sign up for an account at app.covalent.xyz, and you're good to go.
